    • Method Detail

      • drawRect

        public static void drawRect(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch sb,
                            float left,
                            float bottom,
                            float width,
                            float height,
                            com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
        Draws a simple rectangle onto the SpriteBatch. Takes in unscaled position/dimension data (i.e. will scale by Settings.xScale and Settings.yScale in the render step).
        Parameters:
        sb - the SpriteBatch to render on
        left - the left most x-coordinate of the rectangle
        bottom - the bottom most y-coordinate of the rectangle
        width - the width of the rectangle
        height - the height of the rectangle
        color - the color of the rectangle
